fields.label: Does your AML/CTF program comply with the requirements of Part 4.5 for customers acting in the capacity of a partner in a partnership?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that the partnership exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to verify the existence of the partnership.

fields.label: Does your program include systems to ensure the name of each partner in the partnership has been provided?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to ensure all partner names are provided in accordance with the rules.

fields.label: Does your business collect the full name of the partnership?
Does your business collect the full business name (if any) of the partnership as registered under business names legislation?
Does your business collect the country in which the partnership was established?
Does your business collect information about at least one partner according to individual identification procedures?
Does your business collect the full name and residential address of each partner in the partnership (unless regulated status is otherwise confirmed)?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine whether any other KYC information should be collected for a partnership?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems used to determine if additional KYC information is required.

fields.label: Does your business verify the full name of the partnership using reliable and independent sources?
Does your business verify information about at least one partner according to individual identification procedures?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine whether any other KYC information collected should be verified?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for determining which additional KYC information requires verification.

fields.label: Does your business base the verification of partnership information on a partnership agreement or a certified extract?
Does your business use other reliable and independent documents or electronic data for verification?
Does your program include systems and controls to respond to any discrepancies that arise during verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls for identifying and responding to verification discrepancies.

fields.label: Is the partnership considered a 'low risk' customer relationship for the purpose of the simplified verification procedure?
Does your business utilize the simplified verification procedure for low-risk partnerships?
Does the simplified procedure verify the full name of the partnership using at least one reliable and independent source?
Does the simplified procedure verify information about at least one partner in accordance with individual identification procedures?

groups.title: Risk-Based Systems and Controls
groups.description: Mandatory risk-based systems to ensure the existence of the partnership and identification of partners.

groups.title: Collection of Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information and documentation required to be collected for partnerships.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Requirements for verifying the identity of the partnership and its partners.

groups.title: Methods and Discrepancies
groups.description: Acceptable verification sources and procedures for handling data conflicts.
